bridge-type.label: DWD Weather Forecast Opendata Bridge
bridge-type.description: This bridge uses the Deutsche Wetterdienst (DWD) OpenData page and reads the MOSMIX Stations list. The MOSMIX Stations list contains all weather stations which exists and forecast data is available. The list is required to determine the nearest DWD weather station of your location. All information provided by the DWD is protected by copyright. Find the terms of use under: https://www.dwd.de/copyright.
